resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

I have read and understand the customer consent form. I have undertaken the tinting/glue patch test and have observed a 24 hour waiting period after the patch test has been performed. I agree that GE Brow Bar or Superdrug cannot be held responsible for any allergic reaction of the tinting treatment.

I have had a consultation with the therapist who will be performing this procedure and all my questions concerning the process have been answered to my satisfaction. I agree to undertake the tinting/lash extension treatment and fully agree to the Terms and Conditions listed below associated with this treatment. I agree that GE Brow Bar or Superdrug cannot be held responsible for any allergic reaction as a result of this treatment.

Terms and Condition\n
Before giving my consent by signing this form, I have been informed of the methods, nature and schedule of this procedure. I have also undertaken a patch test and observed a 24 hour waiting period after the patch test has been performed.\n I agree to the terms and conditions of this form and I also agree that GE Brow Bar or Superdrug cannot be held responsible for any allergic reaction as a result of this treatment. Therefore there will be no consequent fault by GE Brow Bar Superdrug and I cannot request any monetary or complimentary service repercussions, (whether monetary or complimentary service/treatment reparation, refunding or compensation) to be made to myself by GE Brow Bar or Superdrug, after the tinting/lash extension treatment has been completed on this day. (Refer to the aforementioned date).
